## CSS Grid

- allows you to design web pages layout in easy way by defines the number and the widths of rows and columns. 


**Example**

`.container {`

`display: grid;`

`  grid-template-columns:  50% 50%;`

`  grid-template-rows: 25% 25% 25% 25%;}`



![grid cell](data:image/jpeg;base64,)


## Regular Expressions

- use to extracting information from text by searching for one or more matches of a specific search pattern.

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/676/1*BmpF9a9q35zi-VTf5-Arzg.jpeg)
